code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={value:0,status:'idle'};export var scrollSlice=createSlice({name:'scroll',initialState:initialState,reducers:{scrolling:function scrolling(state){state.value=window.pageYOffset;}}});var scrolling=scrollSlice.actions.scrolling;export{scrolling};export var selectScroll=function selectScroll(state){return state.scroll.value;};export default scrollSlice.reducer;
